channel.title: lufa on open collector
channel.description: Recent content in lufa on open collector

item.title: Hardware Volume Controller
item.description: (5/11/13) - Hey fantastic reader: This is an old how-to (from 4/2/12!) that existed in its own self-contained repository. Reflecting back, this hack was kind of silly, but i’m porting it here to keep everything in one place. And if you’re curious about the long-term viability of this build.. it is still kicking. The detents are a little less crisp now, but everything works a treat. (And now, back to your regularly scheduled post re-run!

item.title: AVR Programming with Adafruit's Atmega32u4
item.description:
Introduction

This guide will help you build your own LUFA AVRISP-MKII clone using the Adafruit Atmega32u4 breakout board.
